name: A Gladiator Tale SPARTACUS
description:
A Great Story

Spartacus was tired of seeing that his brothers were dying in front of his eyes to satisfy people in Rome.

But on that day spartacus was supposed to do something to end this no mather what happens!

Perfect Gameplay

Easy to get controllers for everyone. Lots of different creatures, enemies and Epic Bosses!! you have to defeat during way you will have your revenge and save your brothers

Episode by Episode Gameplay

Play The First Episode for now. And start this great story the new episodes coming soon we are currently working on it
